For<S>1063</S> as<S>3303</S> touching<S>4012</S> the ministering<S>1248</S> to<S>1519</S> the saints<S>40</S>, it is<S>2076</S> superfluous<S>4053</S> for me<S>3427</S> to write<S>1125</S> to you<S>5213</S>:
For<S>1063</S> I know<S>1492</S> the forwardness of<S>4288</S> your<S>5216</S> mind<S>4288</S>, for which<S>3739</S> I boast<S>2744</S> of<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S> to them of Macedonia<S>3110</S>, that<S>3754</S> Achaia<S>882</S> was ready<S>3903</S> a year<S>4070</S> ago<S>575</S>; and<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> zeal<S>2205</S> <S>1537</S> hath provoked<S>2042</S> very many<S>4119</S>.
Yet<S>1161</S> have I sent<S>3992</S> the brethren<S>80</S>, lest<S>3363</S> our<S>2257</S> boasting<S>2745</S> of<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S> should be in vain<S>2758</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> behalf<S>3313</S>; that<S>2443</S>, as<S>2531</S> I said<S>3004</S>, ye may be<S>5600</S> ready<S>3903</S>:
Lest<S>3381</S> haply<S>4458</S> if<S>1437</S> they of Macedonia<S>3110</S> come<S>2064</S> with<S>4862</S> me<S>1698</S>, and<S>2532</S> find<S>2147</S> you<S>5209</S> unprepared<S>532</S>, we<S>2249</S> (that<S>3363</S> we say<S>3004</S> not<S>3363</S>, ye<S>5210</S>) should be ashamed<S>2617</S> in<S>1722</S> this same<S>5026</S> confident<S>5287</S> boasting<S>2746</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> I thought<S>2233</S> it necessary<S>316</S> to exhort<S>3870</S> the brethren<S>80</S>, that<S>2443</S> they would go before<S>4281</S> unto<S>1519</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> make up beforehand<S>4294</S> your<S>5216</S> bounty<S>2129</S>, whereof ye had notice before<S>4293</S>, that the same<S>5026</S> might be<S>1511</S> ready<S>2092</S>,<S>3779</S> as<S>5613</S> a matter of bounty<S>2129</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> as<S>5618</S> of covetousness<S>4124</S>. <sup>bounty: Gr. blessing</sup> <sup>whereof: or, which hath been so much spoken of before</sup>
But<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> I say, He which soweth<S>4687</S> sparingly<S>5340</S> shall reap<S>2325</S> also<S>2532</S> sparingly<S>5340</S>; and<S>2532</S> he which soweth<S>4687</S> bountifully<S>1909</S> <S>2129</S> shall reap<S>2325</S> also<S>2532</S> bountifully<S>1909</S> <S>2129</S>.
Every man<S>1538</S> according as<S>2531</S> he purposeth<S>4255</S> in his heart<S>2588</S>, so let him give; not<S>3361</S> grudgingly<S>1537</S> <S>3077</S>, or<S>2228</S> of<S>1537</S> necessity<S>318</S>: for<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> loveth<S>25</S> a cheerful<S>2431</S> giver<S>1395</S>.
And<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> is able<S>1415</S> to make<S>4052</S> all<S>3956</S> grace<S>5485</S> abound<S>4052</S> toward<S>1519</S> you<S>5209</S>; that<S>2443</S> ye, always<S>3842</S> having<S>2192</S> all<S>3956</S> sufficiency<S>841</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> things, may abound<S>4052</S> to<S>1519</S> every<S>3956</S> good<S>18</S> work<S>2041</S>:
(As<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, He hath dispersed abroad<S>4650</S>; he hath given<S>1325</S> to the poor<S>3993</S>: his<S>846</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> remaineth<S>3306</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> he that ministereth<S>2023</S> seed<S>4690</S> to the sower<S>4687</S> both<S>2532</S> minister<S>5524</S> bread<S>740</S> for<S>1519</S> your food<S>1035</S>, and<S>2532</S> multiply<S>4129</S> your<S>5216</S> seed sown<S>4703</S>, and<S>2532</S> increase<S>837</S> the fruits<S>1081</S> of your<S>5216</S> righteousness<S>1343</S>;)
Being enriched<S>4148</S> in<S>1722</S> every thing<S>3956</S> to<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> bountifulness<S>572</S>, which<S>3748</S> causeth<S>2716</S> through<S>1223</S> us<S>2257</S> thanksgiving<S>2169</S> to God<S>2316</S>. <sup>bountifulness: or, liberality: Gr. simplicity</sup>
For<S>3754</S> the administration<S>1248</S> of this<S>5026</S> service<S>3009</S> not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> supplieth<S>2076</S> <S>4322</S> the want<S>5303</S> of the saints<S>40</S>, but<S>235</S> is abundant<S>4052</S> also<S>2532</S> by<S>1223</S> many<S>4183</S> thanksgivings<S>2169</S> unto God<S>2316</S>;
Whiles by<S>1223</S> the experiment<S>1382</S> of this<S>5026</S> ministration<S>1248</S> they glorify<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S> for<S>1909</S> your<S>5216</S> professed<S>3671</S> subjection<S>5292</S> unto<S>1519</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> for your liberal<S>572</S> distribution<S>2842</S> unto<S>1519</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> unto<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> men;
And<S>2532</S> by their<S>846</S> prayer<S>1162</S> for<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S>, which long after<S>1971</S> you<S>5209</S> for<S>1223</S> the exceeding<S>5235</S> grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1909</S> you<S>5213</S>.
<S>1161</S> Thanks<S>5485</S> be unto God<S>2316</S> for<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> unspeakable<S>411</S> gift<S>1431</S>.
